distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Annual Report, The Col. W. F. Cody ("Buffalo Bill") Historical Pictures Company, 1915

div1.note: JAMES R. NOLAND, Secretary of State

N. B. — This blank must be signed in two places by the President and Secretary of the Company, and the Corporate seal attached thereto and acknowledged before a Notary Public. (See extracts of Act on back hereof.)
div1.head: ANNUAL REPORT
MISCELLANEOUS
div1.ab: (Foreign Domestic) Indicate if Foreign or Domestic by drawing line through word in bracket.

The COL W F CODY ("BUFFALO BILL") HISTORICAL PICTURES COMPANY
(Name of Corporation)
FIRST. Names of Officers and their several places of business.

list.item: Business Address 1544 Champa St., Denver, Colo.
First Vice-President Col W F Cody
Business Address 237 Symes Building, Denver, Colo.
Business Address 1544 Champa St., Denver, Colo.
Business Address 521 First National Bank Building, Chicago, Ill.

div1.ab: SECOND. Names of Directors or Trustees, with the residence and business address of each:

list.item: Geo K Spoor, 521 First National Bank Building, Chicago, Ill.
V R Day, 521 First National Bank Building, Chicago, Ill.
Col W F Cody, 237 Symes Building, Denver, Colo.
F G Bonfils, 1544 Champa St., Denver, Colo.
H H Tammen, 1544 Champa St., Denver, Colo.

div1.ab: THIRD. Total amount of capital stock as fixed and determined by articles of incorporation and amendments thereto $ 12,000.00

list.item: Amount of increased capital stock, if any $ none
Date of amendment to increase capital stock
Amount of decrease to capital stock, if any $
Date of amendment to decrease capital stock
That portion of said capital stock represented by its corporate capital, property and assets located and employed in the State of Colorado $

div1.ab: FOURTH. The proportion of said stock actually paid in $ Entire amount
FIFTH. Setting forth how the same was paid:
SIXTH. Amount of indebtedness at date of filing this report $ 27, 358.00
SEVENTH. State whether or not engaged in actual operation within the State of Colorado: No

EIGHTH. Such other information as will show with reasonable fullness and certainty the condition of real and personal property, and the financial condition of your company at the date of filing this report
The above indebtedness represents cash advanced by the officers of the company for operating expenses.
In Witness Whereof, The President of the said corporation has hereunto set his hand and caused the corporate seal to be affixed this 26th day of February A. D. 1915
CORPORATE SEAL

figure.p: The Col. W. F. Cody ("Buffalo Bill") Historical Pictures Co. SEAL

div1.closer:
Attest: H. H. Tammen
Secretary.
F. G. Bonfils
President.

div1.p: Before me, _____, a Notary Public in and for said County and State, personally appeared F.G. Bonfils, President, and H.H. Tammen, Secretary of The COL W F CODY ("BUFFALO BILL") HISTORICAL PICTURES COMPANY personally known to me to be the persons whose names are subscribed to the foregoing annual report of said corporation, who each being first duly sworn, upon his oath deposes and says, each for himself and not one for the other, that he is the President and Secretary, respectively, of the said The COL W F CODY ("BUFFALO BILL") HISTORICAL PICTURES COMPANY and that the facts thus set forth in said annual report are true, full and complete, and that they as such President and Secretary, respectively, of the said corporation, made, signed and delivered the said annual report in compliance with the statute in such case made and provided.
div1.ab: CORPORATE SEAL.

figure.p: The Col. W. F. Cody ("Buffalo Bill") Historical Pictures Co. SEAL

div1.closer:
F. G Bonfils
President.
H H Tammen
Secretary.

postscript.p: Subscribed and sworn to before me this 26th day of February, A. D. 1915
My commission expires February 26th, A. D. 1918

figure.p: Elmer W. Jones City & County of Denver, Colo. NOTARY PUBLIC
